original_title: Walk Away the Pounds: Muscle Mile One
overview: In just 20 minutes, you’ll zap the calories and "bring back" muscle, sculpt those arms, shoulders, abs, back and chest, and turn flabby into real flex appeal. Plus, all that muscle means a faster metabolism, so you’ll burn fat longer—even after the workout’s over. Talk about a power workout! "Muscle" in on this 1-mile workout and watch the pounds disappear. You can do it!
title: Walk Away the Pounds: Muscle Mile One
